articles.title: Macron's camp plots unlikely comeback amid French election chaos - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: With no one in charge, the French president’s allies believe anything is possible.
articles.content:
In recent weeks several centrist heavyweights have floated the idea of working with the left in a “wide coalition,” though that would need to exclude Mélenchon’s far-left France Unbowed.

articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket launching for 1st time ever this week - Space.com
articles.description: Liftoff is scheduled for Tuesday (July 9) at 2 p.m. ET.
articles.content:
Europe's new heavy-lift Ariane 6 rocket is set to make its long-delayed debut on Tuesday (July 9).
